name: Rattlebone's Quest
description:
Rattlebone's Quest takes place at the end of the great skeleton war, where two necromancer brothers got into a fight and decided to start a war.

The lone soldier, Sir Rattlebone, decides enough is enough and attempts to break into one of the headquarters of the necromancers to end the war once and for all...

Find and use various items to deal with the armies of the undead, such as melee weapons, chestplates, shields and throwable weapons!

Make sure to check the controls section to figure out how to play!

This game was made in about a month for devtober but was delayed for a little bit, to make up for it you are now able to play as the villain of the game once you beat it!
